welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Guerande, a charming medieval town known for its salt marshes and stunning architecture. We hope you take the time to explore and discover the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montoir Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Montoir Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Meucon Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Meucon Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
